text: Hi! I'm looking to identify is there is a solution to make a CTA button populate a variable url based on ip and the button copy to adjust as well? (i.e., user is from CA, CTA says 'Coverage in California' and the following url populates in the CTA: <https://www.copperpoint.com/coverage-by-state?hsLang=en&state=california> Here is the staged experience to see how the CTA lay in the billboard and attached is he current code:  <https://www-copperpoint-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/business-insurance/industries/construction>
